survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee adoption, satisfaction, and challenges with AI-powered tools in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools are you currently using in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-powered HR tools (e.g., onboarding, performance feedback)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include 'Other' as an open-text field if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with 'Other' triggering a text box.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered tools are you currently using in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: AI-powered HR tools (e.g., onboarding, performance feedback)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI tools you currently use?
answer_options: Not applicable (do not use AI tools)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected at least one tool in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Exclude respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q1.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Skip logic: Only show if Q1 != 'None of the above'.
